Funny - my husband and I were just talking about that - along with the fact
that it is so close to Easter.  We really could have the 2nd coming.  *sigh*
It is getting on the tedious side isn't it...

I have to agree with you on your statement on the gov't.  My family watched
another family member do the exact same thing with her husband for over 6
months.  Now I know that isn't nearly as long as this has been going on but
still... is it that hard to put yourself in that person's shoes and think
about how you would REALLY feel about being like that - a prisoner in your
own skin and unable to do anything but drool.

The part that cracks me up the most - or maybe angers me - I can't figure it
out.  All the religious turns - they can let a normally healthy child with a
curable illness go without medical care and let it be "God's will" but
damnit when you are in a vegetative state and have no future but to depend
on family and have to real existence God demands that you put that feeding
tube in and survive or it is murder...  did I miss something here?  Grrrrr

Ok - I am off my soapbox... turning off the news networks now.

Thanks

Shannon
